allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Docker build error by removing duplicate Node.js installations

The post-create.sh script was failing during docker build with exit code 100
because Node.js was being installed multiple times, causing package manager
conflicts.

Changes:
- .devcontainer/Dockerfile: Removed NodeSource installation since Node.js 20
  is already provided by the devcontainer feature in devcontainer.json
- Dockerfile.ralph: Removed nodejs/npm from apt-get, kept only NodeSource
  installation to avoid installing two different Node.js versions
- Added cleanup commands to reduce image size

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
